item.title: Aubury Teleporting help
item.dc:creator: @sk8rdude461 sk8rdude461
item.description:
@sk8rdude461 wrote:

Dude, do it the way I did.
Also, that error is because you need to do NPCHandler.auburyTeleport();
and auburyTeleport needs to be static.

Read full topic

item.title: Aubury Teleporting help
item.dc:creator: @RunePKn00b RunePKn00b
item.description:
@RunePKn00b wrote:

[quote=“RunePKn00b, post:6, topic:528424”]ok your ghetto way didn’t work lol

I tried the other guy’s way so heres what I have…

This is in ActionHandler.java under thirdclick

case 553: auburyTeleport(); c.getPA().startTeleport(2911, 4832, 0, "modern"); break;

And here’s what I have in NPCHandler.java

[code] public void auburyTeleport() {
for (int i = 0; i < maxNPCs; i++) {
if (npcs[i] == null)
continue;
npcs[i].clearUpdateFlags();

	}
	for (int i = 0; i < maxNPCs; i++) {
		if (npcs[i] != null) {
			if (npcs[i].npcType == 553) {
				npcs[i].animNumber = 722;
				npcs[i].gfx0(148);
				npcs[i].animUpdateRequired = true;
				npcs[i].updateRequired = true;
				npcs[i].forceChat("Senventior Disthine Molenko!");
                                    break;
			}
		}
	}
}[/code]

I’m getting this in compiler

source\server\model\players\ActionHandler.java:3386: error: cannot find symbol auburyTeleport(); ^ symbol: method auburyTeleport() location: class ActionHandler Note: Some input files use unchecked or unsafe operations. Note: Recompile with -Xlint:unchecked for details. 1 error Press any key to continue . . .[/quote]

Read full topic

And here’s what I have in NPCHandler.java

[code] public void auburyTeleport() {
for (int i = 0; i < maxNPCs; i++) {
if (npcs[i] == null)
continue;
npcs[i].clearUpdateFlags();

	}
	for (int i = 0; i < maxNPCs; i++) {
		if (npcs[i] != null) {
			if (npcs[i].npcType == 553) {

				npcs[i].updateRequired = true;
				npcs[i].forceChat("Senventior Disthine Molenko!");
                                    break;

}[/code]

I’m getting this in compiler

source\server\model\players\ActionHandler.java:3386: error: cannot find symbol auburyTeleport(); ^ symbol: method auburyTeleport() location: class ActionHandler Note: Some input files use unchecked or unsafe operations. item.title: Aubury Teleporting help
item.dc:creator: @sk8rdude461 sk8rdude461
item.description:
@sk8rdude461 wrote:

So, I made a ghetto way around this…
In NPCHandler.java:
at the top (with the rest of the public static int’s) add:

Then in process() of npcHandler.java
Under:

for (int i = 0; i < maxNPCs; i++) { if (npcs[i] != null) {
Add:

if (npcs[i].npcType == 553) { // NPC ID if (npcForceChat) { npcs[i].updateRequired = true; npcs[i].forceChat("Woof woof!"); npcForceChat = false; } }
In firstClickNpc of action handler, for npc 553:

			case 553:
               	NPCHandler.npcForceChat = true;
                c.getPA().startTeleport(2911, 4832, 0, "modern");
				break;

Read full topic

item.title: Aubury Teleporting help
item.dc:creator: @RunePKn00b RunePKn00b
item.description:
@RunePKn00b wrote:

Ok so this is what I have for the actionhandler.java

case 553: c.getPA().startTeleport(2911, 4832, 0, "modern"); Server.npcHandler.npcs[553].forceChat("Woof woof!"); Server.npcHandler.npcs[553].updateRequired = true; break;
the teleporting part of it works, the npc talking doesnt work. the woof woof is just an example.
please help me get this to work

Read full topic
